definition: former Ningxia province, now Ningxia Hui Autonomous Region 寧夏回族自治區|宁夏回族自治区[Ning2 xia4 Hui2 zu2 Zi4 zhi4 qu1]

sentences.english: There is a great potential of developing the agriculture relying on the Yellow River by exploiting the resource of land in Yinbei, Ningxia.
sentences.chinese: 开发银北土地资源，是宁夏发展黄河农业的潜力所在。

sentences.english: Objective To know the village-level health service of country in Ningxia.
sentences.chinese: 目的了解宁夏农村村级卫生服务的基本现状。

sentences.english: Guyuan region, a well known poor region, is in the south of Ningxia Hui Autonomous Region of China.
sentences.chinese: 固原地区地处宁夏南部，是全国著名的贫困地区。

sentences.english: Some suggestions are proposed for loess hilly area of south Ningxia.
sentences.chinese: 为宁夏南部黄土丘陵区生态恢复提出了几点建议。

sentences.english: Objectives:to determine and analyze the content and chemical components of volatile oil in fresh flower of Apocynum venetum L.
sentences.chinese: 测定宁夏罗布麻鲜花挥发油的含量及化学成分。

sentences.english: In addition to Beijing, the delegation will also visit Ningxia and Shanghai.
sentences.chinese: 除北京外，该团还将访问宁夏和上海。

sentences.english: Objectives: to determine and analyze the content and chemical components of volatile oil in fresh flower of Apocynum venetum L. in Ningxia.
sentences.chinese: 测定宁夏罗布麻鲜花挥发油的含量及化学成分。

sentences.english: Objective To study the species and fauna of mosquito in Ningxia Autonomous Region.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨宁夏蚊类分布及区系结构。

sentences.english: Pinellia tuber is one of the crude medicine plants in Ningxia(Liupanshan district).
sentences.chinese: 半夏是宁夏六盘山区道地中药材之一。

sentences.english: Mutton sub surface is Ningxia famous traditional pasta.
sentences.chinese: 羊肉臊子面是宁夏著名的传统面食。

sentences.english: Objective To study the effects of microelement selenium on the antioxidant system of Lycium barbarum.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究微量元素硒对宁夏枸杞抗氧化系统的影响。

sentences.english: Fe and Se contents were richer in wolfberry leaf tea of Ningxia.
sentences.chinese: 宁夏枸杞叶茶中铁和锌元素含量较丰富。

sentences.english: Children jump rope, Tongxin County, Ningxia, China.
sentences.chinese: 在宁夏同心县，孩子们在进行跳绳运动。

sentences.english: But opposite in other region, the education level in Ningxia dilatoriness.
sentences.chinese: 但相对于其它地区，宁夏教育发展迟缓。

sentences.english: Ningxia was home to the Rong and Di tribes in the Western Zhou dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 宁夏是西周时戎族和羝族的故乡。

sentences.english: In 2010, Ningxia’s GDP totaled 164.3 billion yuan.
